name: Box :The Game
description:
Hello everyone, here is IvanWong and AntonyLai, this is our first game, we hope everyone can enjoy and have fun =)

Feel free to leave a comment =D

In the game making process, Ivan takes care of all the graphics and Antony finishes all the coding part =D

We are Junior 1 student, we learn Unity for about 1 year =D
